拱.definition: to cup one's hands in salute; to surround; to arch; to dig earth with the snout; arched

拱墅.definition: Gongshu district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

拱墅區.definition: Gongshu district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

拱廊.definition: triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)

拱手.definition: to cup one's hands in obeisance or greeting; (fig.) submissive

拱手旁觀.definition: to watch from the sidelines and do nothing (idiom)

拱火.definition: (dialect) (fig.) to fan the flames; to fuel sb's anger

拱璧.definition: a flat round jade ornament with a hole at the center; fig. a treasure

拱肩.definition: a spandrel (wall filling the shoulder between two neighboring arches)

拱頂.definition: an arched roof; a dome; a vault
